title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.KccAns: MARKET RATE OF GINGER = 3500-4000 RS/QTL

records.QueryText: Information regarding Total Fertilizer dose in wheat ?
records.KccAns: Total Fertilizer dose in wheat - UREA 90kg ,DAP 55kg ,20kg POTASH per acre and POTASH is apply after soil test or 40kg in district of Gurdaspur, Hoshiarpur, Ropar and Shaheed Bhagat Singh Nagar.

records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about govt. Schemes?
records.KccAns: Recommended for to know about govt. Schemes please contact rural agriculture extension officer.

records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know how to control  thrips  in orange?
records.KccAns: Use recommended dose of dimethoate 30 EC 30 ml per pump.
RECOMMENDED TO SPRAY  HEXACONAZOLE  400 ML /200 LITRES OF WATER / ACRE

records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regaing weather for indore  dist. of state madhya pradesh?
records.KccAns: According to meteorology department of India there is no chance of  rainfall for next 5 days for your indore district

records.QueryText: Information  regarding control of grasses and broad leaf weeds in wheat ?
records.KccAns: For control of grasses and broad leaf  weeds in wheat spray Accord Plus 22EC(fenoxaprop + metribuzin) 500ml or Shagun 21-11 (metribuzin + clodinafop) 200g or Total 75WG (sulosulfuron + metsulfuron) 16g or Atlantis 3.6WDG (mesosulfuron + iodosulfuron) 160g in 150lt water per acre.

records.QueryText: Asking about inducing flower in sesame
records.KccAns: Recommended for spray Salicylic acid 1 ml / 10 litre of water
TO  ENCOURAGE FLOWERING IN LEMON-SPRAY BOOM FLOWER 2ML IN 1 LITRE WATER.
SPRAY SAAF (CARBENDAZIM 12% + MANCOZEB 63% WP) @ 2 GM / 1 LITER OF WATER FOR CHECKING LEAF SPOT IN BEANS.

records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding control of weeds in wheat crops?
records.KccAns: â€¢	Recommended dose of Sulfosulfuron 75% + Metsulfuran Methyl 5% WG 16 gram per acer after 30 to 35 days of sowing.

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of zinc deficiency in wheat ?
records.KccAns: spray 2.5kg Urea + 500 gm Zinc in 100 Ltr of water /acre
kisan bhai aap Copper Oxichloride 50% wp @ 2 gram prati litre pani ki dar se spray kare.
kisan bhai aapke yaha 02 january tak baaris ki koi sambhawna nhi hai.

records.KccAns: Dear farmer, today and tomorrow you are likely to have light clouds and the rest of the week is likely to be clear.

records.QueryText: farmer want to know about  how  to control of fungal attack in garlic crop ?
records.KccAns: kasukamycin 5/ copperoxychlorite 45/ 250 gram per acre use in garlic crop

records.KccAns: SPRAY OF PLANOFIX 1 ML PER 4 LITER WATER

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT CONTROL OF SEEDLING BLIGHT IN PADDY
records.KccAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY   CARBENDAZIM 12% + MANCOZEB 63% (75% WP)  @ 2 GM  / LIT OF WATER.

records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control mixed weeds in wheat crop ?
records.KccAns: Information regarding how to control mixed weeds in wheat crop ?spray 500 ml accord plus or 16 gm total or 160 gm vesta in 250 liter water / acre at 30-35 days after sowing time .
DEEP COTTON IN NUVAN AND PLACE IT INTO THE HOLE CREATED BY STEM BORER AND COVER THAT HOLE WITH MUD
The advanced varieties of wheat ghee - Raj-3765, UP-2338, PBW-373, K-8020, U.P.-2425, NW-1076, K-9423, K- 7903, Naina (K-9533), D.B.W.-16

records.QueryText: Asking about Micronutrients spray in guava
records.KccAns: Recommended for spray zinc sulphate 5 g +magnesium sulphate 5 g + manganese sulphate 5 g+ ferrous sulphate 2.5 g + cupper sulphate 2.5 g/lit of water
Contact to Agriculture Coordinator or District Agriculture Officer

records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding how to control leaf miner in  mustard  crop?
records.KccAns: Spray imidacloprid 17.8 sl (admire, confidor 200 sc, 250 ml per hectare) 5-7 ml at 15 liter of water.
Suggested: Validamycin 3% L 35 ml / pump spray

records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding control measure of fungal disease in orange  crop?
records.KccAns: Recommended for control of fungal attack spray copper oxychloride 30-40gm/pump and streptocyclin 2 gram at 15 liter of water

records.KccAns: FIRST IRRIGATION IN MUSTERD CROP AT FLOWRING STAGE.

records.QueryText: Information regarding Manganese deficiency in wheat ?
records.KccAns: For Manganese deficiency in wheat in light soil under rice- wheat rotation middle leaf become yellow in streak , spray Manganese Sulphate 1kg in 200 litres of water per acre 2-3 days before 1st irragation and 3afterwards weekly intervals on sunny days.  .
RECOMMENDED TO SPRAY POTASSIUM NITRATE (13-0-45) 5 GRAMS/1 LITRE OF WATER

records.QueryText: Information regarding control of alternaria blight, white rust  in mustard ?
records.KccAns: Spray 600 gram Mencozeb (M-45) in 250 TO 300  liter water per acre and repeat it  3 to 4 times at 15 days interval.
